title: Privilege Audit Summary / Ayrıcalık Denetim Özeti
description: Audits system privileges and role assignments to identify excessive privileges or security risks in user accounts

queries.sql: SELECT GRANTEE, PRIVILEGE, ADMIN_OPTION FROM DBA_SYS_PRIVS WHERE GRANTEE NOT IN ('SYS', 'SYSTEM', 'PUBLIC') ORDER BY GRANTEE, PRIVILEGE

doc_hint: Look for users with excessive privileges like CREATE USER, DROP USER, ALTER SYSTEM, or administrative roles. Ensure privileges follow least-privilege principle.
analysis_prompt: Identify users with dangerous privileges (CREATE USER, DROP, ALTER SYSTEM). Flag any account with ADMIN_OPTION = YES. Recommend privilege reduction if excessive.
